entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 09:30 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -13.1°C
Wind: NW 24 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 9 this morning then steady. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning except temperature steady near minus 11 inland.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning except temperature steady near minus 11 inland. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 3 except minus 6 inland.
